MeetingStart: ^Final post-production Daily Scrum. Report last sprint progress.
Art_Finalization: ^All art revisions completed. Visuals meet quality expectations.
Audio_Completion: ^SFX and BGM meet final version standards. Details polished.
Code_Lock: ^All remaining bugs resolved. System locked for deployment.
Design_Signoff: ^Final docs approved. Gameplay balance validated through 7 test cycles.
Narrative_Delivery: ^Storylines fully coherent. Final scripts and animations ready for delivery.
Launch_Readiness: ^All QA metrics achieved. Post-launch monitoring protocols active.
